alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:40PM PST until January 05 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches above 8000 feet and 6 to 10 inches on the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains above 7500 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
